entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
